short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A web extension for saving content quickly

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This browser extensions creates a quick method to categorize and save the keywords that you want to a temporary area for later use, and you can focus on killing your tabs.
